name: MOVE TO TRASH
description:
An interactive fiction piece by JES. 

Shout out to the community over on the Bitsy Talk Discord server for giving more tech support than I deserved. 

This was JES's final project for an Interactive Fiction workshop taught by Nat Mesnard.

This game can take anywhere from 10 minutes to 30+ minutes to complete, depending on the player. There are several different ending possibilities built into the game as well.
